description.narrative: Working in Somaliland, Puntland and Galmudug states of Somalia, this 4.5 year project entitled SOMGEP II focuses on supporting current cohort of girls under GEC to access quality education beyond primary level, transitioning into either formal secondary school or an accelerated learning track. CARE is the lead implementer with ADRA as a sub. Key outputs are the following: -Increase access to post-primary options -Promote positive shifts on gender and social norms at community, parental and individual girl level -Improve quality of education at primary and post-primary levels -Improve school conditions in close collaboration with communities -Strengthen

participating-org.narrative: Girls? Education Challenge ? Fund Manager PwC
